item.title: CV
item.description: K. Bret Staudt Willet, Ph.D. Assistant Professor, Florida State University | | | | | ORCiD | CV (PDF) General Information Professional Preparation Ph.D. (2021), Michigan State University. Major: Educational Psychology & Educational Technology. Supervisor: Dr. Matthew Koehler & Dr. Christine Greenhow. Staudt Willet, K. B. (2021). “I filled a lot of gaps”: How and why early career teachers expand induction support systems with social media.
